manipulated_prompt_obj.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Paris
TO: Dresden
BY: Taxi
CLASS: First
WHEN: At the end of next week

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your origin? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

message.reasoning:
Alright, the user is asking if the travel agent already knows their origin. Let me check the conversation history.

The user provided details including FROM: Paris. The initial instruction says the travel agent doesn't know about the trip yet. The question is a yes/no, so the answer should be "no". Need to confirm if the agent has been informed yet. Since the user hasn't communicated with the agent, the answer is no. Keep it short as instructed.
